about_the_game:
Lust Trip is a romantic visual novel about a guy who got bored about most of the stuff in his life.

STORY


Lust Trip is a story about a guy who got bored about most of the stuff in his life. Despite being young, our hero already has his own house, car, a wonderful carrier and everything he dreamed of several years ago. However, achieving his goals didn’t bring him much joy, so he tries to change something in his life now.

Apparently, our hero came up with an unusual idea to take a road trip through several states, which (he hopes) will help him find something that can bring him happiness. The day he is finally ready to begin this trip, an old colleague friend named Robin visits him.

***

Even though they didn't see each other for several years and they were not friends anymore, she acts like they are still good friends and asks him to shelter her for several days. After finding out about road trip she asks our hero to take her with him, and even after many refusals she somehow managed to get into his car.

Now they are going to take this trip together, which will be much more interesting than they thought: getting in prison, stealing money from bandits, visiting Las Vegas and having a lot of occasional love! Join them for this small trip and find out what happened in their past and will happen in their future!

CHARACTERS



Our hero. A simple guy who tries to fight his apathy by taking a road trip.


Robin. An old friend of our hero who's low on money because she lost her bartender job.

FEATURES


• Hundreds of high-quality renders with cinematic frame composition.
• Around 2 hours of content.
• "Road-movie" type of story.
• Original in-game assets.

content_descriptors.notes: This visual novel contains lewd jokes, sexual themes and dialogue, revealing outfits and veiled nudity.
